QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ui_view_settings.id odf_pk, odf_ui_view_settings.LAYOUT layout, odf_ui_view_settings.CODE code, odf_ui_view_settings.VIEW_ID view_id, odf_ui_view_settings.NAME name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME updated_by, ODF_UI_VIEW_SETTINGS.CREATED_DATE created_date, odf_ca_odf_ui_viewsetting.partition_code partition_code, ODF_UI_VIEW_SETTINGS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE last_updated_date, odf_ui_view_settings.VALUE value, CREATED.FULL_NAME created_by from odf_ui_view_settings odf_ui_view_settings, odf_ui_views odf_ui_views, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED, odf_ca_odf_ui_viewsetting odf_ca_odf_ui_viewsetting where 1 = 1 and odf_ui_view_settings.view_id = odf_ui_views.id and odf_ui_view_settings.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_ui_view_settings.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id and odf_ui_view_settings.id = odf_ca_odf_ui_viewsetting.id
